attributes.action: Increase the manning Levels of Police Officers, abolishing Community Police Officers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Taxpayers money is being wasted on a sub-standard form of Policing.   The next generation of Leaders in the Police Service,and it's Specialised Investigators can only come from proper Police Officers,street wise, not from Community Police Officers who are who are poorly trained with little powers.  Ask your Local Police Officers what they think of the Community Police Officers, and you will find no suuport for the system.
